statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({4.42}+{8.56}\right)}={25.96}\approx{25.96}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.56}\cdot{3.39}={29.0184}\approx{29}.
